questions.text: Why was Frasier in a good mood?
questions.correct: Next week marked the anniversary of when he and Lilith met.
options: Lilith got him a new car.
He finally beat Woody at chess.
questions.explanation:
Next week marked the anniversary of when he and Lilith met.

	If you remember, when Lilith and Frasier first met, it did not go well at all. However, now they were in a great relationship and Frasier was finally happy again. He had not been happy for a long time after Diane jilted him at the altar.

questions.text: What was the name of Coach's niece?
questions.explanation:
Joyce.

	Joyce was played by Cady McClain. McClain was born in 1969 in California. Her real name was Katie McClain. She is best known for doing soap operas.

questions.text: Who said they' "blow their brains out" if anything happened to his daughter?
questions.explanation:
Coach's niece's father.

	This put a lot of pressure on Sam as it was expected he'd look after Joyce while she was in Boston. At first it wasn't an issue, but as the time went on it got harder and harder to look after her.

questions.text: Who went out with Coach's niece?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody and Joyce hit it off right away. Sam thought it was a good thing since Woody was so innocent.

questions.text: Did anyone get engaged in this episode?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Woody and Joyce got engaged briefly. They hadn't known each other very long, but believed they wanted to spend the rest of their lives together.

questions.correct: He was afraid of what Coach's niece's father would say.
options: He was secretly in love with Coach's niece.
He doesn't own a good suit.
questions.explanation:
He was afraid of what Coach's niece's father would say.

	Sam was unhappy that Woody and Joyce got engaged because of how her father would react. He tried to convince them not to get married.

questions.text: Why was Frasier in a bad mood?
questions.correct: He didn't get the golf clubs he wanted.
options: He and Lilith had a fight.
He was annoyed with Cliff's constant talking.
questions.explanation:
He didn't get the golf clubs he wanted.

	He believed the whole time that he would get golf clubs from Lilith and was quite disappointed when he didn't get them. Instead she bought him a tie.

questions.text: What did Diane want to name her future child?
questions.explanation:
Emile.

	Sam said that a meal was something you ate, not something you name a child. Diane thought it was the greatest name however.

questions.text: Instead of getting married, what did the young couple decide to do?
options: Date and get to know each other
questions.explanation:
Move in together.

	Sam was relived that Woody and Joyce weren't getting married. But then when they told him of their new plan his worrying came back.

questions.text: What did the young couple ultimately decide to do?
questions.explanation:
date.

	Sam and Diane were able to convince them to just date for a while. They would have plenty of time because Joyce was going to be in Boston for awhile while she attended college there.
